page.title: 02Northumbria Police H.Q.
page.content: The Northumbria Police took over a building complex,just outside Ponteland,which for the previous twenty years had been the Northumberland Teachers Training College. The site was originally developed in the early part of the this century as "The Cottage Homes",a village complex for orphans from the Newcastle area. The complex now houses the following Police departments: Administration department Personnel Department Training Department Criminal Investigation Department Complaints & Discipline Department Inspection & Development Community Involvement Support Services Traffic Division Public Relations
